question: Which state to have India's first privately-run railway station?
explanation: The Union Railway Minister Suresh Prabhu has stated that the Habibganj station in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh has been handed over to a private firm to be operated by it. With this, Habibganj station has become the India\'s first privately-run railway station. The station building will be developed in line with airport terminals. Though, the trains at the station will still be run by the Railways.
